title: クラーケン、Backed買収　米国株のトークン化取引を拡大
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所クラーケンがスイスのBacked Finance買収を発表。トークン化株式サービス「xStocks」は半年で取引高100億ドルを突破。RWA市場は2028年に2兆ドル規模へ成長見込み。

title: December Fed cut unlikely, but Bitcoin will be fine: Kevin O’Leary
contentSnippet: Kevin O’Leary said he is not positioning his investments around expectations that the US Federal Reserve will cut rates in December.

title: Kalshi raises $1B at $11B valuation after best volume month
contentSnippet: Kalshi has doubled its valuation after its latest Series E funding round, which come as the prediction market posted record trading volumes last month.

title: Kraken to Acquire Tokenization Platform Backed Finance as Crypto Exchange Extends Buying Spree
contentSnippet: The company said that the transaction would "accelerate the global adoption of xStocks."

title: Crypto Winter Is Not Coming, Myriad Users Say
contentSnippet: In a Myriad prediction market, just 9% of respondents expected a crypto winter.

title: 欧州10銀行がユーロ連動ステーブルコイン発行へ、2026年後半に開始予定
contentSnippet: INGやBNPパリバなど欧州10銀行がユーロ連動ステーブルコイン発行を計画中。新会社キバリスを設立し2026年後半の発行を目指す。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: バンカメ「資産管理サービスの顧客は仮想通貨投資を検討すべき」　最大4%のポートフォリオ配分を推奨
contentSnippet: バンク・オブ・アメリカは、資産管理サービスの顧客に対しポートフォリオの最大4%を仮想通貨などのデジタル資産に配分するように推奨していることがわかった。ビットコイン現物ETFも投資対象にする計画だ。

title: IBIT Among Most-Traded ETFs as Bitcoin Surges; Mining Stocks Sink
contentSnippet: A 6% rally in bitcoin helped push IBIT ahead of major funds like VOO, but crypto miners including IREN and CIFR posted steep losses.

title: ETH briefly touches $3K but traders remain skeptical: Here’s why
contentSnippet: Ether price surged to $3,000 on Tuesday, but lagged behind the US stock market rally as muted demand for ETH derivatives and growth in competing blockchains kept traders skeptical.

title: Taurus adds staking backbone to its custody system via Everstake integration
contentSnippet: The move combines Everstake’s validator infrastructure with Taurus’ regulated custody stack, adding a staking pathway for institutional clients.

title: トム・リーのビットマインが継続的にイーサリアムを押し目買い、3日間で110億円相当
contentSnippet: ビットマインが市場下落局面でも3日間に110億円相当のイーサリアムを追加購入した。同社は約373万ETHを保有し総供給量5%保有の目標に向け62%まで進捗。

title: Group of EU banks pushes for a euro-pegged stablecoin by 2027
contentSnippet: The entity formed by 10 banks is working on obtaining regulatory approval from the Dutch Central Bank to launch a stablecoin “in the second half of 2026.”

title: 米CME、ビットコインの恐怖指数VIXなどの新ベンチマークを導入
contentSnippet: 米CMEがビットコイン、イーサリアム、ソラナ、XRPを対象とした仮想通貨ベンチマーク指数を導入した。ビットコインのボラティリティを追跡する指数は株式市場のVIXに相当し、機関投資家のリスク管理ツールとなる。

title: Rizzmas is Back? Christmas Solana Meme Coin Wakes From Hibernation
contentSnippet: As December starts, meme coin traders are decorating their Christmas trees and buying up Rizzmas tokens.

title: Kraken adds Backed Finance to 2025 acquisition streak, brings xStocks in-house
contentSnippet: The acquisition will give Kraken full control of the xStocks tokenized-equity platform, strengthening the exchange’s push into regulated real-world assets.

title: Bitcoin Dipped Below 'Fair Value' for First Time in 2 Years, History Says 132% Gains Next 12 Months
contentSnippet: Network reset complete: leverage flushed, LTHs accumulating and price back above fair value.

title: チェーンリンク初の現物ETFがNYSEで取引開始、グレースケール「GLNK」
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨チェーンリンクの初の現物ETFが3日にニューヨーク証券取引所で取引を開始した。グレースケールがGLNKとして上場し運用資産は1700万ドル超となっている。

title: Lawmakers stumble on stablecoin terms as US Congress grills Fed’s Bowman
contentSnippet: Representative Stephen Lynch questioned Fed supervisor Michelle Bowman about her comments on digital assets at a November conference in Madrid.

title: 米SEC委員長が仮想通貨向け「イノベーション免除」導入へ、資金調達環境の改善を重視
contentSnippet: 米SECのアトキンス委員長が仮想通貨セクター向けの「イノベーション免除」導入を表明した。新たな法律を待たずにイノベーションを促進する方針で、2005年以降改革されていない開示規制の包括的見直しも発表した。

title: AAVE Rallies 14% as Bybit, Mantle Integration Connects DeFi Lender to 70M Users
contentSnippet: The DeFi lender's native token broke above key resistance level, eyeing $190 as the next target level.

title: Solana on-chain flows flag notable supply shift as SOL trades near key support
contentSnippet: Solana’s supply crunch and liquidity inflows kept the price above $120, but demand from futures traders remained subdued.

title: Why The Market Crashed On October 10, And Why It’s Struggling to Bounce
contentSnippet: MSCI’s proposed reclassification and potential index exclusion of Digital Asset Treasury (DAT) companies now looms over the market as a major structural overhang, says Dr. Avtar Sehra, founder and CEO

title: Vanguard Crypto ETFs, Coinbase Lawsuit & Strategy's $1.44B Reserve - Daily Crypto Recap
contentSnippet: Today’s headlines: The latest on Vanguard ETFs, Coinbase lawsuit, Strategy $1.44B reserve, & more. This is Decrypt's Daily Recap with host @Tyler_Did_It. Your crypto round-up for December 2nd 2025

title: What to Expect From Ethereum’s Fusaka Upgrade?
contentSnippet: Ethereum’s latest major network upgrade is coming Wednesday. Here’s what users can expect.

title: CME launches Bitcoin volatility index as institutional crypto trading matures
contentSnippet: CME has rolled out new crypto benchmarks, including a Bitcoin volatility index designed to sharpen risk pricing across futures and options markets.

title: Amazon Enters AI Arms Race as Crypto and Risk Asset Fears Mount
contentSnippet: The pivot to AI comes with risks, including heavy borrowing and concerns about sustainability, with potential shortfalls if demand for AI slows.

title: XRP and Solana Are Jumping. They Just Got 2 Leveraged ETFs.
contentSnippet: XRP and Solana rose on Tuesday, regaining ground lost in crypto markets’ recent slump.

title: The BIG Crypto Fake-Out! Saylor & Tether FUD! Vanguard Crypto ETFs!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors are green and reversing yesterday’s selloff, with BTC up 2% at $87,400, ETH flat at $2,820, BNB up 2% at $842, and SOL up 2% at $129. Among top movers, Fartcoin (+14%), SPX (+12%), and P

title: Bank of America Endorses Up to 4% Allocation of Wealth Management Portfolios to Crypto: Report
contentSnippet: The bank joined a growing list of traditional finance firms that have increased their embrace of digital asset investment strategies.

title: Trump-Backed American Bitcoin Plunges 40% on Heavy Volume, Dragging Hut 8 Lower by 12%
contentSnippet: The collapse marks yet another disappointing Trump family crypto-related investment.

title: Bitcoin Volatility Breaks Out Vs VIX, Setting Up Possible Pair Trade Opportunity
contentSnippet: The spread between BTC and S&P 500 implied volatility indices is widening again.

title: AI Investment to Drive Global Growth Through 2026, BofA Says
contentSnippet: Bitcoin miners have been among those riding the AI boom, with IREN and Cipher Mining up over 300% in 2025.

title: Why Coinbase Shares Still Have 90% Upside Despite Crypto Pullback, According to Wall Street Analyst
contentSnippet: Bernstein kept its Street-high $510 price target on Coinbase, citing strong fundamentals and product expansion.

title: Brazil Sentences 14 for Using Crypto, Shell Firms in $95M Drug Money Laundering Case
contentSnippet: The defendants were found to have used fake companies and cryptocurrency transactions to conceal the origin of the illicit funds.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP Spike a Day After Mass Sell-off
contentSnippet: Bitcoin surges past $90,000 in biggest rally since May as crypto markets rebound with strong ETF inflows.

title: Strategy announces $1.44B reserve to cover debt! Vanguard Crypto ETFs! Myriad partners with Trust Wallet!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors are green and reversing yesterday’s selloff, with BTC up 2% at $87,400, ETH flat at $2,820, BNB up 2% at $842, and SOL up 2% at $129. Among top movers, Fartcoin (+14%), SPX (+12%), and P

title: AIがスマートコントラクト脆弱性6億9000万円分を発見　防御活用にも期待＝レポート
contentSnippet: Anthropicの研究で、AIエージェントがスマートコントラクト脆弱性6億9000万円分を発見。2025年3月以降の34件で460万ドル相当の攻撃に成功し、新たに2件のゼロデイ脆弱性も発見。攻撃収益は1.3カ月ごとに倍増しており、防御活用が急務に。

title: イーサリアムの買い方｜初心者向け取引所比較とリスク・税金まで解説
contentSnippet: 米国初のビットコインETF承認の影響でBTC価格が過去最高値を更新し、仮想通貨投資による資産運用の注目度が急上昇しています。本記事では初心者向けに高騰するイーサリアム（ETH）の買い方、アルトコイン投資のメリットやデメリット、リスクなどを解説しています。

title: FRBが3年半にわたる量的引き締め（QT）終了、仮想通貨市場に流動性改善の可能性
contentSnippet: 米FRBが12月1日、3年半にわたる量的引き締め(QT)を終了した。約2.4兆ドル規模の資産縮小後、仮想通貨市場への流動性改善が期待される。2019年QT終了時はビットコインが短期下落後に上昇した経緯があるが、専門家は政策効果の遅延やインフレ動向など不確実性に慎重な見方も示している。
